resources.string: Sign up using either your Google account or mobile number, and get the account verified by Team Aparoksha
We need some details to verify your identity. Please enter details before proceeding.
You need to upload pictures about your promotion efforts to score points. We need some permissions to do so. Please grant before proceeding.
Keep a track of the files you\'ve uploaded, while they get verified by us. Receive points and increase your XP!!
Reach a new level, and get a Bonus Scratch Card, which may fetch you even more points!
Permissions are required to use camera and gallery to upload pictures.
